elements.text:
Your friend convinces you to go on a walk through a local park. You have heard that there are poisonous snakes in that park.

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

texts: Even though it makes me uncomfortable thinking about snakes in the park, I know that I can go into the park anyway.
I think about telling my friend that I've changed my mind, but go with them anyway.
I like talking to this friend.
I'm going to die if a snake bites me.
